metadata.remarks: A simple custom security framework used to demonstrate OSCAL control mappings.
metadata.title: Framework A - Custom Security Controls

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Establish and maintain an access control policy that defines how access to systems and data is managed.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Require authentication for all users accessing organizational systems.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Restrict and monitor privileged access to critical systems.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Enable audit logging for security-relevant events on all systems.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Review audit logs regularly to identify potential security incidents.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Classify data based on sensitivity and apply appropriate protections.

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit.
